testsuite.name: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version while Forced Offline

testcase.name: Given offline mode is enabled with reachable internet

testcase.name: And the candidate "grails" version "1.3.9" is already installed and default
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version while Forced Offline

testcase.name: And the candidate "grails" version "2.1.0" is not installed

testcase.name: And an initialised environment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version while Forced Offline

testcase.name: And the system is bootstrapped
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version while Forced Offline

testcase.name: When I enter "sdk use grails 2.1.0"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version while Forced Offline

testcase.name: Then I see "Stop! grails 2.1.0 is not available in offline mode."
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an uninstalled candidate version while Forced Offline
